pullRequest.title: Fix #1232 Per-extension documentation pages
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix #1232
I initially applied the new plugin for auto-generation of the extension pages only to activemq and ahc. I will add it to all extension later when there is enough agreement about the approach.

nodes.bodyText: Might be better to separate the support level (JVM and native) out into it's own heading. WDYT?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+// Do not edit directly!
+// This file was generated by camel-quarkus-package-maven-plugin:update-extension-doc-page
+
+[[activemq]]
+= ActiveMQ
+
+*Since Camel Quarkus 1.0.0-M5, JVM and native*

nodes.bodyText: Maybe 'Included components'? I don't want to get too hung up on wording so if you disagree, that's ok.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+// Do not edit directly!
+// This file was generated by camel-quarkus-package-maven-plugin:update-extension-doc-page
+
+[[activemq]]
+= ActiveMQ
+
+*Since Camel Quarkus 1.0.0-M5, JVM and native*
+
+Send messages to (or consume from) Apache ActiveMQ. This component extends the Camel JMS component.
+
+== What's inside

nodes.bodyText: 'for usage details' instead of 'for the usage'
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+// Do not edit directly!
+// This file was generated by camel-quarkus-package-maven-plugin:update-extension-doc-page
+
+[[activemq]]
+= ActiveMQ
+
+*Since Camel Quarkus 1.0.0-M5, JVM and native*
+
+Send messages to (or consume from) Apache ActiveMQ. This component extends the Camel JMS component.
+
+== What's inside
+
+* https://camel.apache.org/components/latest/activemq-component.html[ActiveMQ component]
+
+Please refer to the above links for the usage.

nodes.bodyText: The change of ordering does not look right. Let me check.
nodes.diffHunk:
